wait_for_debugger

Option wait_for_debugger instructs the Unit Test Framework to pause before starting test units execution, so that you can attach a debugger to running test module. By default this parameters turned off.

Acceptable values

Boolean with default value no.

Command line syntax
  • --wait_for_debugger[=<boolean value>]
  • -w [<boolean value>]
Environment variable 
BOOST_TEST_WAIT_FOR_DEBUGGER
